enhanced_description: Talkpush is an automated recruiting solution designed to streamline and accelerate the sourcing, screening, and hiring processes. It leverages advanced technologies including chatbots, artificial intelligence (AI), automated workflows, robotic process automation (RPA), and optical character recognition (OCR) to perform tasks in a fraction of the time traditionally required. The platform facilitates instant and personalized candidate engagement across their preferred communication channels, such as SMS, email, Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, and Telegram, all from a single platform. Talkpush features behavioral-driven workflows to adapt to candidate actions and boost application completion rates. It supports targeted candidate reach and authentic employer branding, underpinned by a data-driven approach to recruitment, aiming to help organizations hire top talent faster and more efficiently. The 'Wide Reach' highlight also suggests a capability to connect with advertising experts for cost-efficient candidate generation.
